channel.title: Security on R15Cookie Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Security on R15Cookie Blog

item.description: {% include JB/setup %} Another vulnerability on the heels of Lenovo’s Superfish, there is a somewhat serious issue with Dell’s System Detect Utility reported by F-Secure (via Fierce IT Security). At least this wasn’t specifically a Malware-like application, but still makes one pause about the amount of pre-installed software on modern Windows PCs, and the difficulty of doing a clean OS install.
